name: everything-agent
description: AI coding assistant toolkit - Claude Code, OpenCode, and more

plugins.name: suggest-compacting
plugins.description: Automatically suggests when to manually compact context during long sessions

plugins.name: git-guard
plugins.description: Git workflow protection hooks - prevents commit and PR bypasses

plugins.name: lsp-bash
plugins.description: Bash Language Server integration for Claude Code

plugins.name: lsp-typescript
plugins.description: TypeScript/JavaScript Language Server integration for Claude Code

plugins.name: lsp-python
plugins.description: Python Language Server integration using Pyright for Claude Code

plugins.name: lsp-go
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Go - provides gopls integration for Go code completion, diagnostics, and navigation

plugins.name: lsp-kotlin
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Kotlin - code completion, diagnostics, go-to-definition, and other IDE features

plugins.name: lsp-lua
plugins.description: Lua Language Server Protocol support - lua-language-server for .lua files

plugins.name: lsp-nix
plugins.description: Language Server Protocol support for Nix - provides autocomplete, diagnostics, and code navigation for Nix files

plugins.name: me
plugins.description: Personal Claude Code configuration - TDD, systematic debugging, git workflow, code review, development automation, and auto-installs all baleen-plugins

plugins.name: ralph-loop
plugins.description: Continuous self-referential AI loops for interactive iterative development, implementing the Ralph Wiggum technique. Run Claude in a while-true loop with the same prompt until task completion.

plugins.name: handoff
plugins.description: Session handoff plugin for Claude Code - save and restore session context between sessions

plugins.name: databricks-devtools
plugins.description: Databricks SQL schema explorer for Unity Catalog discovery

plugins.name: jira
plugins.description: Jira integration for issue tracking and project management. Triage bugs, capture tasks from notes, generate status reports, and automate Jira workflows using Atlassian's MCP server.
